Vision¶

A collection of functions related to computer vision

Color¶

color_delta(color1, color2) Percentage difference between two colors
get_colors(image_path[, color_count, …]) Get predominant color(s) in a given image

Face¶

Image transformations and manipulations

get_faces(image_path[, mode, output_dir, …]) Get all faces within an image
get_eyes(image_path[, mode, output_dir, …]) Get all eyes within an image
get_landmarks(image_path[, model, mode]) Get coordinates of 68 facial landmarks from a given image
average_faces(directory_path, output_filepath) Average a set of faces into a single composite image

Face3D¶

face_to_3d(input_images[, output_path, …]) Download an image or video from a URL

I/O¶

Image retrieval and reading from / writing to disk

download(url, filename) Download an image or video from a URL
write_points_to_disk(filename, input_list) Write a list of points in form (x, y) to disk
get_points_from_disk(filename) Get a list of points in form (x, y) from saved file
load_png(image_path[, alpha_color]) Get a list of points in form (x, y) from saved file

Transform¶

Image transformations and manipulations

draw_points_on_image(image, point_list[, …]) Draw points on an image
draw_rect_on_image(image, xy[, radius, color]) Draw points on an image
create_collage(width, height, min_size, …) Create a collage from a list of images
